body_html:
I agree, there is actually no need to modify the DataLoader. I didn't thought about using the BatchSampler. I can use it with the DataLoader like I did in the code above or even simpler just build a custom iterator using the BatchSampler.

Thanks for your help and time @fmassa and @apaszke .

body:
I agree, there is actually no need to modify the DataLoader. I didn't thought about using the BatchSampler. I can use it with the DataLoader like I did in the code above or even simpler just build a custom iterator using the BatchSampler.

Thanks for your help and time @fmassa and @apaszke .
